list.Title: Tenet
list.Description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

list.Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
list.Description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities

list.Title: Knives Out
list.Description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

list.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
list.Description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

list.Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
list.Description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping  program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.
